column1: # This table of constellation shapes is adapted from Martin Krzywinski's table:
# which is in turn based on the IAU constellation figures shown here:
# Abbreviation for Corona Australis was capitalized to CrA from Cra.
# Constellation shapes are sets of lines defined by star pairs. Columns are:
# HR1 and HR2 are Bright Star catalog numbers of star pair in each line.
# Constellations are ordered alphabetically by their abbreviation.
# Within a constellation star pairs are arbitrarily ordered by the HR index
# of the star with the smaller HR index.
